text.content: Yesterday evening was very peaceful. I was sitting in my favorite chair. I was reading a mystery novel. The sun was setting outside my window. Birds were singing in the trees. My cat was sleeping on the sofa. Suddenly, the doorbell rang. I was not expecting anyone. I got up and opened the door. It was my friend Sarah. She was carrying a big box of pizza!

The children were doing their homework when their parents came home.

text.content: While I was cooking, my husband was cleaning the house. I was reading a book while the children were playing in the garden. She was talking on the phone while he was watching the news. We were studying while our friends were having fun at the party. My mother was preparing dinner while my father was fixing the car. The teacher was explaining the lesson while the students were taking notes. I was listening to music while I was working on my laptop.

text.content: The scene was beautiful. The sun was shining brightly in the sky. White clouds were floating peacefully. Children were laughing and playing in the park. Their parents were sitting on benches and talking. Some people were walking their dogs. An old man was feeding the pigeons. A young couple was having a picnic on the grass. Everyone was enjoying the lovely summer day. It was a perfect moment.

text.content: Excuse me, I was wondering if you could help me. I was hoping you might have a few minutes to talk. We were thinking about going to the cinema tonight. Would you like to join us? I was planning to call you later. I was just wondering what time the meeting starts. She was asking if you would be available tomorrow. They were hoping to get some advice from you. I was meaning to ask you about that project.

overview.title: Past Continuous - Background
overview.subtitle: Set the scene in stories
overview.description: Use the Past Continuous to describe background actions or atmosphere in past stories.

uses.label: Set the scene
uses.example: The sun was shining. Birds were singing.

uses.label: Background in stories
uses.example: I was sitting at home when...

timeSignals.title: STORY CONTEXT
regular: What was happening before the main event

examples.sentence: The sun was setting when we arrived.
Birds were singing in the trees.

overview.title: Past Continuous - Interrupted Actions
overview.subtitle: Actions interrupted by something
overview.description: Use Past Continuous for a longer action that was interrupted by a shorter Past Simple action.

affirmative.subject: Pattern
affirmative.verb: I was doing X when Y happened

affirmative.subject: Example 1
affirmative.verb: I was cooking when the phone rang

affirmative.subject: Example 2
affirmative.verb: She was driving when she saw the accident

uses.label: Longer action interrupted
uses.example: I was reading when you called.

uses.label: Two actions: one interrupts
uses.example: I was sleeping when the alarm rang.

commonErrors.wrong: I read when the phone rang.
commonErrors.correct: I was reading when the phone rang.
commonErrors.explanation: Use continuous for the longer/background action.

commonErrors.wrong: I was reading when the phone was ringing.
commonErrors.correct: I was reading when the phone rang.
commonErrors.explanation: The interrupting action is Past Simple.

examples.sentence: I was taking a shower when someone knocked.
They were playing when it started to rain.

slides.title: WATCH OUT
slides.correct: I was reading when phone rang

overview.title: Past Continuous - Parallel Actions
overview.subtitle: Two actions happening at the same time
overview.description: Use Past Continuous for two or more actions that were happening at the same time in the past.

affirmative.subject: Pattern
affirmative.verb: I was doing X while Y was happening

affirmative.subject: Example 1
affirmative.verb: I was cooking while he was cleaning

affirmative.subject: Example 2
affirmative.verb: She was studying while they were watching TV

uses.label: Simultaneous actions
uses.example: I was reading while she was cooking.

uses.label: Different people, same time
uses.example: He was working while I was sleeping.

commonErrors.wrong: I was cooking while he cleaned.
commonErrors.correct: I was cooking while he was cleaning.

examples.sentence: I was studying while my roommate was watching TV.
The children were playing while the parents were talking.

overview.title: Past Continuous - Descriptions
overview.subtitle: Describe a past scene
overview.description: Use Past Continuous to paint a picture of what was happening in a scene or moment.

uses.label: Paint a picture
uses.example: The sun was shining. Birds were singing.

examples.sentence: The sun was setting and birds were flying home.

overview.title: Past Continuous - Polite Requests
overview.subtitle: Sound more polite
overview.description: Use Past Continuous with verbs like 'wonder', 'hope', 'think' to make requests more polite.
